raw_comment:
I wonder what events took place that caused Indonesia to have such a high percentage of 15 to 24-year-olds and 40-year-olds say that the world is getting better?

I noticed that the 40+ year-olds in the U.S. think that the world is getting worse with each generation while the 15-24-year-olds think the world is getting better with each generation.

This relates to my community because I am apart of the 15-to-24-year-old age group in the U.S.
ace_sentences: Indonesia has a high percentage of 15-to-24-year-olds who say that the world is getting better.
Indonesia has a high percentage of 40-year-olds who say that the world is getting better.
I wonder what events caused these high percentages in Indonesia.
In the U.S., many people who are older than 40 years think that the world is getting worse with each generation.
In the U.S., many people who are 15-to-24 years old think that the world is getting better with each generation.
I am a person who is 15-to-24 years old.
